info.title: Equipment360 API
info.description: API for interacting with Equipment360. Operations require the 'e360:read' or 'e360:write' scope.

get.summary: Returns a list of all business units.

404.description: Endpoint Not Found. This response may occur if the on-premises E360 service does not exist or is not currently running.

get.summary: Get total fuel cost for all jobs.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted after startDate, inclusive.

schema.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted after startDate, inclusive.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted prior to endDate, inclusive.

schema.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted prior to endDate, inclusive.

parameters.name: jobCode
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted filtered by job code.

schema.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted filtered by job code.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted filtered by business unit. The business unit guid.

schema.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all costs submitted filtered by business unit. The business unit guid.

404.description: Endpoint Not Found. This response may occur if the on-premises E360 service does not exist or is not currently running.

schema.description: Required. The business unit guid.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all work order costs where work orders are tagged with the specified tag.

schema.description: Optional. If specified, totals will reflect all work order costs where work orders are tagged with the specified tag.

get.summary: Returns a list of all custom fields and their details.

post.description:
All fields are required. EntityGUID refers to the ID associated with the item the custom field record is being attached to (e.g. Equipment ID, Parts ID, Work Request ID, etc.)
For help with authorization, see https://developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/request-tokens

post.summary: Transfer ownership of equipment between business units.
post.description:
Note: Transferring ownership of equipment between business units will reset the following fields associated with the equipment: Job, Region, Division, and Default Mechanic.
For help with authorization, see https://developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/request-tokens

get.summary: Retrieve timecard information for one or all employees.

parameters.description: Optional. Filter time cards based on status.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Optional. The point at which to start pagination. Defaults to 1.

schema.description: Optional. The point at which to start pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: beginDate
parameters.description: Optional. Specifies starting date for time card results.

schema.description: Optional. Specifies starting date for time card results.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Optional. Specifies end date for time card results.

schema.description: Optional. Specifies end date for time card results.

parameters.name: mechanicId
parameters.description: Optional. Filter out all time cards except the specified mechanic.

schema.description: Optional. Filter out all time cards except the specified mechanic.

parameters.name: includeShiftDetails
parameters.description: Optional. Include additional shift details (if available) for each time card. Defaults to false.

schema.description: Optional. Include additional shift details (if available) for each time card. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns all work orders.

schema.description: The total number of records to return. Default: 100. Limit: 1000.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The point at which to start pagination.

schema.description: The point at which to start pagination.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: "workOrderNumber" or "statusDate". Default: workOrderNumber.

schema.description: "workOrderNumber" or "statusDate". Default: workOrderNumber.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: "asc" or "desc". Default: asc.

schema.description: "asc" or "desc". Default: asc.

schema.description: Filters work orders by status.

parameters.description: Set to true to filter to PM work orders, false to filter to non-PM work orders, and null for all work orders.

schema.description: Set to true to filter to PM work orders, false to filter to non-PM work orders, and null for all work orders.

parameters.description: If true, the returned ApiWorkOrderRead object will include a list of the work order's notes. Default is false.

schema.description: If true, the returned ApiWorkOrderRead object will include a list of the work order's notes. Default is false.

ApiBusinessUnitRead.description: A representation of a Business Unit object returned by the API.

jobId.description: The job id. Returns as empty guid for costs where a job isn't specified.

totalFuelCost.description: Total fuel cost, including both Dispenses and Direct Fluid Purchases.

ApiFuelCostRead.description: A representation of a Fuel Cost object returned by the API.

jobCode.description: The job to which the work order costs belong.

laborCost.description: The total labor cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedLaborCost.description: The total estimated labor cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

partCost.description: The total parts cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedPartCost.description: The total estimated parts cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

otherCost.description: The total sublet vendor cost and other cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedOtherCost.description: The total estimated sublet vendor and other cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

totalCost.description: The sum of labor, part, and sublet vendor and other costs across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedTotalCost.description: The sum of estimated labor, part, sublet vendor and other costs across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

ApiWorkOrderCostRead.description: A representation of a Work Order Cost object returned by the API.

workOrderNumber.description: The work order number to which the work order costs belong.

workOrderDescription.description: The request description to which the work order costs belong.

workOrderCreatedDate.description: The work order creation date to which the work order costs belong.

workOrderStatusCode.description: The work order status to which the work order costs belong.

hasWorkOrderDamageTag.description: The value indicating if work order has damage tag to which the work order costs belong.

jobCode.description: The job to which the work order costs belong.

laborCost.description: The total labor cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

partCost.description: The total parts cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

otherCost.description: The total sublet vendor and other cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

totalCost.description: The sum of labor, part, and sublet vendor and other costs across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedLaborCost.description: The total estimated labor cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedPartCost.description: The total estimated parts cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedOtherCost.description: The total estimated sublet vendor and other cost across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

estimatedTotalCost.description: The sum of estimated labor, part, and sublet vendor and other costs across all work orders filtered by the given jobCode, equipmentId, or tag.

ApiWorkOrderCostExtendedRead.description: A representation of a Work Order Cost Extended object returned by the API.

count.description: The number of records within the returned dataset.

prev.description: The integer value that will return the previous {count} of Data<typeparamref name="T" /> if passed as a cursor param.

next.description: The integer value that will return the next {count} of Data<typeparamref name="T" /> if passed as a cursor param.

timestamp.description: A UTC, unix timestamp of the time of the request.

ApiWorkOrderCostExtendedReadApiPagedResp.description: A representation of a cursor paginated object returned by the API.

id.description: The ID associated with the custom field record.

customFieldType.description: The type of custom field record (e.g. Equipment, Employee, Location, etc.).

customFieldName.description: The custom field category name associated with the custom field record.

customFieldCategoryId.description: The unique integer associated with the custom field category.

entityId.description: The integer key associated with the target.

entityGuid.description: The ID associated with the target.

value.description: The value assigned to the custom field record.

workComplete.description: Indicates whether the scheduled work is complete

mechanic_Id.description: Id of the mechanic assigned to the work order

vendor_ID.description: Id of the vendor assigned to the work order

ApiWorkOrderScheduleRead.description: A representation of a Work Order Schedule object returned by the API.

count.description: The number of records within the returned dataset.

prev.description: The integer value that will return the previous {count} of Data<typeparamref name="T" /> if passed as a cursor param.

next.description: The integer value that will return the next {count} of Data<typeparamref name="T" /> if passed as a cursor param.

timestamp.description: A UTC, unix timestamp of the time of the request.

ApiWorkOrderScheduleReadApiPagedResponse.description: A representation of a cursor paginated object returned by the API.
